Loader¶

Load all the swfconduit plugins and prepare for running

The loader reads the config file, loads the server packages, creates the swfconduit Server and Twisted Factory, and sets everything up for the twistd daemon.

class swfconduit.loader.Loader¶

Load a swfconduit

add_server(config)¶

Create the server from the given config

add_services(service_parent)¶

Add services to the given twisted service_parent

get_application()¶

Get the twisted application with all the plugin services added

load_from_config(filename)¶

Load settings from the configuration file

servers¶

The list of servers we made
